message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm looking to sell it for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle at $15,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but $15,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $16,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $16,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but $14,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $15,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
